member.name: CONDITION_TYPE
member.summary: Provides a set of flags to be used with the following methods to indicate the type of condition tree node:,,, and.

member.name: CONDITION_TYPE.CT_AND_CONDITION
member.summary: Indicates that the values of the subterms are combined by "AND".

member.name: CONDITION_TYPE.CT_OR_CONDITION
member.summary: Indicates that the values of the subterms are combined by "OR".

member.name: CONDITION_TYPE.CT_LEAF_CONDITION
member.summary: Indicates that the node is a comparison between a property and a constant value using a .
